Data:
==Applies To==

* PCI DSS Requirement 2.3

==Policy Statement==

Use an encrypted network tunnel to secure remote administrator access.

==Policy Purpose==

Encrypting remote administrative access makes sure that a potential attacker cannot get administrative authentication credentials or other information about the network by eavesdropping.

==Related Guidance==

* [[bd139cdc-59b2-4da0-9bdf-2205cc402266|Encrypt Communication Channels]]

==Related Checklist Items==

* [[5339bbde-f2ec-43a3-a689-7652dc6ae151|Communication Channels Are Encrypted]]
